markOrderAsBeingDelivered(Order) - Static method in class pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils.DatabaseWriter
Updates the status of the order entered from "has been cooked" to "being delivered", if and only if the status of the order is still "has been cooked" and the order's delivery method is "deliver at home".

markOrderAsDelivered(Order) - Static method in class pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils.DatabaseWriter
Updates the status of the order entered from "being delivered" to "delivered", if the delivery method is "deliver at home", or from "has been cooked" to "delivered" when the delivery method is "pickup at restaurant.

markOrderAsFinishedCooking(Order) - Static method in class pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils.DatabaseWriter
Updates the status of the order entered from "being cooked" to "has been cooked", if and only if the status of the order is still "being cooked".
markOrderAsInProgress(Order) - Static method in class pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils.DatabaseWriter
Updates the status of the order entered from "registered" to "being cooked", if and only if the status of the order is still "registered".
